sentences: Pioneering the use of the monophonic synthesizers like the ARP 2600 and Minimoog, Hammond Novachord, Hammond C3 organ, and the Mellotron, Paolo Rustichelli composed and produced various movie soundtracks and a progressive rock album, Opera Prima (RCA 1973).
His jazz-rock album Mystic Man (1996) featured Miles Davis, Carlos Santana, Herbie Hancock, Wayne Shorter, Andy Summers, and Jill Jones.
Tenor Pl√°cido Domingo sang Paolo Rustichelli's "Kyrie" on his album Sacred Songs (2002).
Paolo is currently working on his Album "Tempus Fugit" which is scheduled to be released in March 2020.
